section.heading: Sale of alcohol vaporizing devices prohibited

content.p:
* ยง 399-dd. Sale of alcohol vaporizing devices prohibited. 1. For
purposes of this section, "alcohol vaporizing device" means any device,
machine or process which mixes spirits, liquor or other alcohol product
with pure oxygen or other gas to produce a vaporized product for the
purpose of consumption by inhalation.
 2. No person, corporation, partnership or limited liability company
shall knowingly sell or offer for sale an alcohol vaporizing device.
 3. A violation of the provisions of this section shall be an offense
punishable by a fine of not more than five thousand dollars. A violation
of the provisions of this section after having been previously convicted
of such an offense within the previous five years shall be a class B
misdemeanor punishable by a fine of not more than ten thousand dollars.
 * NB There are 3 ยง 399-dd's
